text:
Allen Bernard West (born February 7, 1961) is an American political commentator and politician. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives. A member of the Republican Party, West represented in the House from 2011 to 2013.
In July 2019, West announced he would be running for the chairmanship of the Republican Party of Texas in 2020.
On May 23, 2020, West was in a motorcycle crash just outside Waco, Texas.
